metadata.title: CVE-2021-38371 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
The STARTTLS feature in Exim through 4.94.2 allows response injection(buffering) during MTA SMTP sending.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1
exim4-base - 4.96-14ubuntu1
exim4-config - 4.96-14ubuntu1
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.96-14ubuntu1
exim4-daemon-light - 4.96-14ubuntu1
eximon4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.96-14ubuntu1').
